title: Sophie Turner keeps it casual in red tartan coat as Joe Jonas chats on phone in Beverly Hills
text:
They've been married since May.

But Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner showed they can still lead separate lives as they were seen together in Beverly Hills having two different conversations.

The Jonas Brothers frontman, 30, handled business on his cell phone while standing next to his 23-year-old lady love, who got chatty with a male pal beside him.

Out: Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner showed they can still lead separate lives as they were seen together in Beverly Hills having two different conversations

Joe wore a pink pull-over sweater with navy straight-leg jeans and grey running sneakers.

Sophie wore a red buffalo-print utility shirt over a white tee with leggings on the bottom.

Their sighting comes a week after Sophie mocked Instagram influencers in a quick Instagram Story video.

Busy: The Jonas Brothers frontman, 30, handled business on his cell phone while standing next to his 23-year-old lady love, who got chatty with a male pal beside him

The Game of Thrones actress began in a fake American accent: 'Hey you guys, just kind of going for my influencer look today.'

She was wrapped in a massive scarf a woolen beanie for the video that featured a filter that made her cheeks rosy and her lips plumped.

Sophie continued: 'Today I just wanted to promote this new powdered stuff that you put in your tea, and basically it makes you s*** your brains out and is totally really really bad for me to be promoting to young women and young people everywhere but I don’t really care because I’m getting paid money for it.'

LOL: Their sighting comes a week after Sophie mocked Instagram influencers in a quick Instagram Story video

'Influencer life,' she said at the end of the video.

Her Instagram Story is a poke at the diet powders and teas several prominent influencers including the Kardashians promote via social media.

Sophie and Joe were wed on May 1, 2019.
description: They've been married since May. But Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner showed they can still lead separate lives as they were seen together in Beverly Hills having two different conversations.
